description.value:
You summon a &Reference[fey]{fey} creature of challenge rating 6 or lower, or a &Reference[fey]{fey} spirit that takes the form of a &Reference[beast]{beast} of challenge rating 6 or lower. It appears in an unoccupied space that you can see within range. The &Reference[fey]{fey} creature disappears when it drops to 0 hit points or when the spell ends.

The &Reference[fey]{fey} creature is friendly to you and your companions for the duration. Roll initiative for the creature, which has its own turns. It obeys any &Reference[vocal]{verbal} commands that you issue to it (no action required by you), as long as they don't violate its alignment. If you don't issue any commands to the &Reference[fey]{fey} creature, it defends itself from hostile creatures but otherwise takes no actions.

If your &Reference[concentration]{concentration} is broken, the &Reference[fey]{fey} creature doesn't disappear. Instead, you lose control of the &Reference[fey]{fey} creature, it becomes hostile toward you and your companions, and it might attack. An uncontrolled &Reference[fey]{fey} creature can't be dismissed by you, and it disappears 1 hour after you summoned it.

The GM has the &Reference[fey]{fey} creature's statistics. Some sample creatures are listed below.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the challenge rating increases by 1 for each slot level above 6th.

Sample Creatures

CR Creature Name
0 Frog, Sea Horse, Baboon, Badger, Bat, Cat, Crab, Deer, Eagle, &Reference[giant]{Giant} &Reference[fire]{Fire} Beetle, Goat, Hawk, Hyena, Jackal, Lizard, Octopus, Owl, Quipper, Rat, Raven, Scorpion, Spider, Vulture, Weasel
1/8 Blood Hawk, Camel, Flying Snake, &Reference[giant]{Giant} Crab, &Reference[giant]{Giant} Rat, &Reference[giant]{Giant} Weasel, Mastiff, Mule, Poisonous Snake, Pony, Stirge
1/4 Axe Beak, Blink Dog, Boar, Constrictor Snake, Draft Horse, Elk, &Reference[giant]{Giant} Badger, &Reference[giant]{Giant} Bat, &Reference[giant]{Giant} Centipede, &Reference[giant]{Giant} Frog, &Reference[giant]{Giant} Lizard, &Reference[giant]{Giant} Owl, &Reference[giant]{Giant} Poisonous Snake, &Reference[giant]{Giant} Wolf Spider, Panther, Riding Horse, Sprite, Wolf
1/2 Ape, Black Bear, Crocodile, &Reference[giant]{Giant} Goat, &Reference[giant]{Giant} Sea Horse, &Reference[giant]{Giant} Wasp, Reef Shark, Satyr,Warhorse
1 Brown Bear, Dire Wolf, Dryad, &Reference[giant]{Giant} Eagle, &Reference[giant]{Giant} Hyena, &Reference[giant]{Giant} Octopus, &Reference[giant]{Giant} Spider, &Reference[giant]{Giant} Toad, &Reference[giant]{Giant} Vulture, Lion, Tiger
2 &Reference[giant]{Giant} Boar, &Reference[giant]{Giant} Constrictor Snake, &Reference[giant]{Giant} Elk, Hunter Shark, Plesiosaurus, Polar Bear, Rhinoceros, Saber-toothed Tiger, Sea Hag
3 &Reference[giant]{Giant} Scorpion, Green Hag, Killer Whale
4 Elephant
5 &Reference[giant]{Giant} Crocodile, &Reference[giant]{Giant} Shark
6 Mammoth
7 &Reference[giant]{Giant} Ape
8 Tyrannosaurus Rex
